bullet points: Independently building a visually engaging, one-page website exploring the music's influence on the brain using HTML, CSS (including animation), and JavaScript (data visualization).
Collaborating with fellow students in the CodePath Web Development class to learn and explore layout, functionality, and interactivity  within front-end development.
Built and programmed a remote controlled drone using C++ which successfully launched and flew for two minutes.
Completed coursework in Intro to Unmanned Aircraft Vehicles, Drone Laws and Remote Pilot Certification, Intro to Drone Aeronautics, and Drone-based Land Surveying.
Earned FAA Remote Pilot Small Unmanned Aircraft System Certificate.

role: American Museum of Natural History BridgeUp: STEM Intern
bullet points: Created data visualizations graphs on climate change, earthquakes, sea temperature anomalies, star clusters, and Covid-19 using Python.
Developed Python scripts to identify the largest repeating unit within a spider protein sequence and utilized HTML and CSS to showcase similarities between different spider species.
Mentored incoming BridgeUP members as a Big Sib.
